headline: Sr. Vice President Information Technology | IT Strategy, Leadership | Healthcare Executive | M&A | Value Creation | Cost Optimization | PE Advisor | Member Sim Chicago
about:
💰 𝐈 𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐭𝐞𝐜𝐡 𝐭𝐨 𝐠𝐫𝐨𝐰 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐞𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐯𝐚𝐥𝐮𝐞

⚙️ 𝖠𝗌 𝗍𝗁𝖾 𝗉𝗋𝗂𝗇𝖼𝗂𝗉𝖺𝗅 𝗈𝖿 𝖺 𝗍𝖾𝖼𝗁 𝖺𝖽𝗏𝗂𝗌𝗈𝗋𝗒 𝖺𝗇𝖽 𝗌𝖾𝗋𝗏𝗂𝖼𝖾 𝖼𝗈𝗆𝗉𝖺𝗇𝗒, 𝗆𝗒 𝖿𝗈𝖼𝗎𝗌 𝗂𝗌 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗋𝗈𝗏𝗂𝗇𝗀 𝗍𝖾𝖼𝗁 𝗉𝖾𝗋𝖿𝗈𝗋𝗆𝖺𝗇𝖼𝖾 𝗍𝗁𝖺𝗍 𝐚𝐜𝐜𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐠𝐫𝐨𝐰𝐭𝐡, 𝐞𝐱𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐬 𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐬, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐦𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐠𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐜𝐲𝐛𝐞𝐫 𝐬𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐫𝐢𝐬𝐤𝐬

👉 𝖲𝖾𝖾𝗄𝗂𝗇𝗀 𝗈𝗉𝗉𝗈𝗋𝗍𝗎𝗇𝗂𝗍𝗂𝖾𝗌 𝗍𝗈 𝗌𝗎𝗉𝖾𝗋𝖼𝗁𝖺𝗋𝗀𝖾 𝖼𝗈𝗆𝗉𝖺𝗇𝗒 𝗋𝖾𝗌𝗎𝗅𝗍𝗌 𝖺𝗌 𝖺 𝐭𝐞𝐜𝐡 𝐚𝐝𝐯𝐢𝐬𝐨𝐫 𝗈𝗋 𝖿𝗎𝗅𝗅 𝗍𝗂𝗆𝖾, 𝗂𝗇𝗍𝖾𝗋𝗂𝗆 𝗈𝗋 𝖿𝗋𝖺𝖼𝗍𝗂𝗈𝗇𝖺𝗅 Chief Information Officer (𝐂𝐈𝐎) or Chief Technology Officer (𝐂𝐓𝐎) roles

🩺 𝖲𝗉𝖾𝖼𝗂𝖺𝗅𝗂𝗓𝗂𝗇𝗀 𝗂𝗇 𝗁𝖾𝖺𝗅𝗍𝗁𝖼𝖺𝗋𝖾 - 𝖧𝗈𝗆𝖾 𝖧𝖾𝖺𝗅𝗍𝗁 | 𝖲𝖾𝗇𝗂𝗈𝗋 𝖫𝗂𝗏𝗂𝗇𝗀 | 𝖧𝗈𝗌𝗉𝗂𝖼𝖾 | Behavioral 𝖧𝖾𝖺𝗅𝗍𝗁 | 𝖯𝗁𝗒𝗌𝗂𝖼𝖺𝗅 𝖳𝗁𝖾𝗋𝖺𝗉𝗒 | 𝖲𝗉𝖾𝖼𝗂𝖺𝗅𝗍𝗒 𝖯𝗁𝖺𝗋𝗆𝖺𝖼𝗒 | 𝖧𝗈𝗆𝖾 𝖨𝗇𝖿𝗎𝗌𝗂𝗈𝗇 | 𝖯𝗋𝗂𝗆𝖺𝗋𝗒 𝖢𝖺𝗋𝖾 | 𝖬CO's | Post-Acute Care

👑 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐬𝐞
𝖢𝖨𝖮 * 𝖢𝖳𝖮 * 𝖲𝗍𝗋𝖺𝗍𝖾𝗀𝗂𝖼 𝖯𝗅𝖺𝗇𝗇𝗂𝗇𝗀 * 𝖢𝗅𝗈𝗎𝖽 * 𝖣𝖺𝗍𝖺 & 𝖠𝗇𝖺𝗅𝗒𝗍𝗂𝖼𝗌 * 𝖠𝗋𝗍𝗂𝖿𝗂𝖼𝗂𝖺𝗅 𝖨𝗇𝗍𝖾𝗅𝗅𝗂𝗀𝖾𝗇𝖼𝖾 (𝖠𝖨) * 𝖯𝗋𝗈𝖽𝗎𝖼𝗍 𝖬𝖺𝗇𝖺𝗀𝖾𝗆𝖾𝗇𝗍 * IT Strategy * 𝖬𝖾𝗋𝗀𝖾𝗋𝗌 𝖺𝗇𝖽 𝖠𝖼𝗊𝗎𝗂𝗌𝗂𝗍𝗂𝗈𝗇𝗌 (𝖬&𝖠) * 𝖱𝖾𝗏𝖾𝗇𝗎𝖾 𝖢𝗒𝖼𝗅𝖾 𝖬𝖺𝗇𝖺𝗀𝖾𝗆𝖾𝗇𝗍 (𝖱𝖢𝖬) * 𝖵𝖾𝗇𝖽𝗈𝗋 𝖬𝖺𝗇𝖺𝗀𝖾𝗆𝖾𝗇𝗍 * 𝖤𝖱𝖯 * 𝖢𝖱𝖬 * 𝖤𝖧𝖱 / EMR 𝗂𝗆𝗉𝗅𝖾𝗆𝖾𝗇𝗍𝖺𝗍𝗂𝗈𝗇𝗌 * 𝖢𝗒𝖻𝖾𝗋 𝖲𝖾𝖼𝗎𝗋𝗂𝗍𝗒 | Service Now | Call Center

⚡𝐂𝐚𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐫 𝐇𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐬
• Senior Vice President IT 𝖺𝗍 Therapy Partners Group - Led Call Center relocation from overseas to US, Implemented Voice AI into scheduling and implemented Virtual Check-In and replaced infrastructure at 153 locations saving a total over over 2.5M in first year.
• Vice President IT at Elite Dental Partners- Recovered from a massive cyber event 10 days on the job. Recovered 92 locations with no data loss in 8 business days. Implemented new cyber security platform within 6 months.
* Director IT - Franciscan Ministries - Led implementation of new EMR (point Click Care) in 15 locations.
Show less

headline: Saas Enterprise Sales Leader
about:
Digital Transformation specialist! I’ve been fortunate to have been exposed to some of the brightest people in Technology, Staffing and Recruitment. I’ve seen the journey of digitisation and machine learning into Automation and AI and been a key part of some epic wins in the process. With the native Bullhorn platform & particularly in the last few years with the 'Bullhorn for Salesforce' platform.

I love solving problems through technology! Helping complex Enterprise organisations reduce duplication, increase efficiency and grow faster.

My talent is bringing those resources together to focus on Sales campaigns, leading from the front and continually developing the playbook from initial contact with Prospects through to trusted partner and in many cases , enduring friendships
Show less
